No intercepting weaponfire :-)

::Cledar::

Cledar jumps up and out of the way of the flying Sinnertwin, some 
flame charring his right arm. He turns and fires a stream of plasma 
at Sinnertwin.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> The wave of plasma almost reaches Sinnertwin, but it is lost in the 
fire
> of his deadly breath. Something else hit him from behind however, 
and
> sent him flying forwards, his breath and cannon shooting wildly 
around
> him.
